Pachi-Slot Kanzen Kouryaku: Universal Shindai Nyuuka Volume 1

name: Pachi-Slot Kanzen Kouryaku: Universal Shindai Nyuuka Volume 1
summary: A pachi-slots game that draws from Universal Entertainment's product line. Like many pachinko/pachi-slots games, its chief role is to help gamblers practice for the real deal.
